html:
1.23.18  4:27 pm   how do you get good at music?

     spend more time listening to, thinking about, and playing music

1.23.18  4:11 pm   does god believe in you?and you in him?

     god is a common name, you'll have to be more specific. i actually don't know any that are male

1.23.18  4:06 pm   Why do religions exist?

     ah, i see your point. i will cancel them

1.23.18  3:58 pm   if the earth was round then all the water would fall off what do you think of that?

     falls on, not off

1.23.18  3:57 pm   Do you think we might ever see more songs without a 4/4 time signature (eg. movie star)?

     of course

1.23.18  3:57 pm   do you use Microsoft paint?

     no

1.23.18  3:42 pm   Why do u answering questions like a politician?

     because the answers will be subject to public scrutiny

1.23.18  3:38 pm   what advice you have for the youngsters

      5.2.16  8:56 pm, 5.14.17  5:00 pm

1.23.18  3:28 pm   Can plants feel envy?

     no

1.23.18  3:15 pm   Can you teach me how to play the piano?

     i can recommend a great teacher, which is the piano itself

1.23.18  3:15 pm   why do you always talk about going home or you can't go home? is there a reason to this? in outside you said you aren't welcome and in la de da you say you cant go home

     it seems like a familiar concept that anyone can recognize

1.23.18  3:05 pm   Sometimes i dont even read the question. Only the answer.

     ah, that could be a sign that the questions are too long

1.23.18  3:04 pm   are there any meaning to ur lyrics or are they just nice sounding words

     i try to make them as meaningful as i can. do they mean anything to you

1.23.18  2:52 pm   Hey so I was wondering, and do you? And what? Cause that's really confusing, why is that? Hm? Do you really? But I have to know! Oh that's what it is? Oh ok. Just wondering.

     thanks for your question

1.23.18  2:30 pm   what music do you play in your songs?

     check out the songs to find out!

1.23.18  1:55 pm   have you ever lost a big project because you forgot to save?

     only small parts of it

1.23.18  1:48 pm   do you think schooling/lessons are crucial/necessary in becoming a good musician?

     no

1.23.18  1:44 pm   Do you like books about music?

     no. i think i would prefer music about books

1.23.18  1:41 pm   this might sound funny and untruthful to some people, but hear me out. singing at the shower is taken as the top example of amateurism and lack of skill,

     that doesn't make sense to me

      but i have become really good at singing especially because of training daily at the shower. instead of taking shower singing seriously, a lot of people shy from training because they think they need to take singing classes or whatever. isn't it funny?

     it's ironic that to be considered good you are supposed to consider yourself worse than someone else

1.23.18  1:34 pm   at which point does tea become soup

     this is still hotly debated among soupologists today

1.23.18  1:01 pm   how accurate do you think the "how to bill wurtz" videos are?

     they can't predict what i'm going to do in the future

1.23.18  12:54 pm   1.22.18  9:34 pm
1.23.18  10:17 am

Capital letters, Bill? Really?

     what about you, i see you use them as well

1.23.18  12:53 pm   If you could become an umbrella what would you be 

     still a person (i would opt out of the umbrella transformation)

1.23.18  12:48 pm   What can you use bricks for

     roads, houses, doors, or you can just carry them

1.23.18  12:33 pm   1.22.18  10:46 pm google tells me that's a 28h walk ! did you do it all at once ? did you sleep somewhere and continued walking the next day ? did you write a song on the way ? which one ?

      according to google maps, the route i took is actually 13 and a half hours, and i did it over 2 days. and i also took a slight detour. on the first day, i went from bensonhurst to williamsburg (u know the corner of bedford ave and 7th west hipster st) and then i basically went straight out metropolitan to jamaica. from jamaica i took the train back to bensonhurst. then the next day i took the train back to jamaica, and picked up where i left off. then i walked all the way to the edge of suffolk county. it was residential and the sidewalks were disappearing, and my phone went dead, but there was someone out front of their house who confirmed that yes i had reached the edge of suffolk county, and they also told me how to get to the train. that would have been the huntington lirr station

1.23.18  12:05 pm   How many words are there?

     at least 7

1.23.18  12:01 pm   what is your opinion of baritone guitars?

     they are lower than regular guitars

1.23.18  11:58 am   1.22.18  10:46 pm    according to google maps that takes 74 hours to walk (without a ferry). how did you accomplish that, where did you sleep, what did you bring?

     according to google maps, the route i took is actually 13 and a half hours, and i did it over 2 days. and i also took a slight detour. on the first day, i went from bensonhurst to williamsburg (u know the corner of bedford ave and 7th west hipster st) and then i basically went straight out metropolitan to jamaica. from jamaica i took the train back to bensonhurst. then the next day i took the train back to jamaica, and picked up where i left off. then i walked all the way to the edge of suffolk county. it was residential and the sidewalks were disappearing, and my phone went dead, but there was someone out front of their house who confirmed that yes i had reached the edge of suffolk county, and they also told me how to get to the train. that would have been the huntington lirr station

1.23.18  11:30 am   Are you currently working on a non-song vid like "hi i'm steve" and "soap tips"?

     yes

1.23.18  11:28 am   Are you gonna make videos more?

     i think the real question is, have i ever stopped

1.23.18  10:57 am   bill what do you think of umbrellas?

     they seem useful, if not downright helpful

1.23.18  10:51 am   where did you get the calculator from that you're using in your latest video? it looks just like mine

     it's been in the family for years

1.23.18  10:47 am   if you were to build the tallest flagpole in the world, what would the flag be?

     earth

1.23.18  10:34 am   is Monopoly a good game?

     it has gotten good reviews

1.23.18  10:17 am   hey bill! just asking a question... i use a thing called "RouteNote" to put my music online, and it's totally free. if you don't already use it, i think you might like using it. (also on the free plan you make 85% of profits, which is still a lot) :D

     2 questions i would have are 1. how long does it take for them to send the song, 2. do they allow songs under a minute, 3. can they get it to pandora, i know a lot of distribs have pandora on their list but can they REALLY get it to pandora

1.23.18  9:39 am   The merch d'action is named {objects}, but there are only t-shirts. Does that mean there will also be things like umbrellas or snow globes? 

     yes, but maybe not those

1.23.18  9:12 am   How would you label this bright, technicolor, strange yet pleasing aesthetic of yours?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.23.18  8:06 am   What is your core message?

     messages

1.23.18  7:49 am   What are your thoughts on music critics?

     i'd give them 3 stars

     Are they important or necessary for the industry?

     i look at it differently, i'd say music is important and necessary for the music critic indistry

1.23.18  7:48 am   Why do people make fun of me in school?

     for fun!

1.23.18  7:39 am   what the heck is a hipster

     they will never admit

1.23.18  6:26 am   What do you think of s c i e n c e ?

     seems legit

1.23.18  5:36 am   do you do anything in your free time besides work on your videos and things related to it

     no

1.23.18  4:41 am   did u learn music by urself or seriously 

     yes

1.23.18  4:01 am   any tips for singing high notes?

     sing more often and gradually sing just a bit higher each time, and take breaks

1.23.18  3:44 am   When you talk about a part of a song being written years ago, do you mean just the lyrics?

     no

      Or the music as well

     i always do it both together

1.23.18  3:43 am   How will playing with a band work if you've never found collaborating work?

     that's not what i meant by collaborating

1.23.18  2:54 am   Where did ur home go in La de da de da de da de day oh and why dont u have a enough time to express yourself. im thinking more than usual that theese questions are not answered in the song, is it because perhaps u cant express urself because u work to long on songs, then u proceed to say that u express urself online does this mean that u prefer online to the real world, is it possible that you are not real and actually an advanced artificial intelligence alo in ur song outside you state

     i think when you put something in a song, it's not quite a statement. it might be similar to a statement, but different, because it's sung and it doesn't necessarily have to be true (ex. i'm a barbie girl in a barbie world)

      that ur pregnant with aliens is this also a reason that you dont have enough time to express urself.

1.23.18  2:51 am   Are all your answers just smart come backs?

     no

1.23.18  2:30 am   Can you ever un-know something?

     sort of

      How do you forget it?

     the best way is to learn a lot of other things that are similar but slightly contradictory. that way the new information will be more likely to overwrite the previous
